title: Minus33 / CCW Belts Real Leather - Premium USA Made - Work Belt - Concealed Carry Gun Belt
features: MADE IN THE USA OF USA LEATHER - 100% American - 100% Quality - THICK & DURABLE GUN BELT -GUARANTEED TO LAST! Made by Skilled Amish Craftsmen. A tough belt for CCW wear, that won't cost a fortune! This is it, the CCW Belt! CCW Belts help you improve your ability to access and hold your firearm.

100% FULL GRAIN LEATHER - NO FILLERS- These CCW Belts will never split like some cheaper belts - Made from 100% Full-Grain leather, the CCW Belt can take anything you throw at it and will continue to look great. Full Grain leather is the top layer of the hide which is the toughest part, making this concealed carry belt indestructible.

17 OZ LEATHER - 1.5" WIDE - Vegetable Tanned leather. Approximately .27"-.32" thick No Sag, No Rollover, No Stretching we guarantee it! Add extra ammo, a mag flashlight and anything else you might need for everyday carry. These belts are built to last and last they will. Removable buckle is fastened with removable Chicago Screws instead of snaps so the buckle can easily be changed!
This belt will not break and if it does, send it back, we'll get you another one, for free! We standby our quality.
FREE EXCHANGES ON YOUR CONCEALED CARRY BELT! FIT TIP: For Sizing Please refer to the drop down box - if you have any questions please contact us. We are here to help
description: 100% Leather USA MADE CCW Gun Belt, Work Belt, Amish Belt, Made In USA
